metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PowerDNS Authoritative Server before 4.4.3, 4.5.x before 4.5.4, and 4.6.x before 4.6.1 and PowerDNS Recursor before 4.4.8, 4.5.x before 4.5.8, and 4.6.x before 4.6.1, insufficient validation of an IXFR end condition causes incomplete zone transfers to be handled as successful transfers.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
